name: YOLO?
description:
As a soul collector, you will enjoy this totally fresh puzzle game.
Plan the perfect death accidents to complete your satisfying job. Don’t miss any details.
Unlock and explore everything in the scene and test your savvy, imagination, and logic skills.
Are you ready? YOLO? Make them regret it.


We are ready to make your game experience even greater!
Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better.
Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
